xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:variable name="vartemp1"> <xsl:call-template name="replaceAll"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="." /> <xsl:with-param name="specialCharacter" select=""{ARProtocol}"" /> <xsl:with-param name="escapeCharacter" select="'${protocol}'" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="vartemp2"> <xsl:call-template name="replaceAll"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="$vartemp1" /> <xsl:with-param name="specialCharacter" select=""{ARMidTierHost}"" /> <xsl:with-param name="escapeCharacter" select="'${midtierHost}'" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="vartemp3"> <xsl:call-template name="replaceAll"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="$vartemp2" /> <xsl:with-param name="specialCharacter" select=""{ARMidTierPort}"" /> <xsl:with-param name="escapeCharacter" select="'${midtierPort}'" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="replaceAll"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="$vartemp3" /> <xsl:with-param name="specialCharacter" select=""{ARServerHost}"" /> <xsl:with-param name="escapeCharacter" select="'${serverHost}'" /> </xsl:call-template> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="replaceAll"> <xsl:param name="text" /> <xsl:param name="specialCharacter" /> <xsl:param name="escapeCharacter" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($text,$specialCharacter)"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($text,$specialCharacter)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:value-of select="$escapeCharacter" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="replaceAll"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="substring-after($text,$specialCharacter)" /> <xsl:with-param name="specialCharacter" select="$specialCharacter" /> <xsl:with-param name="escapeCharacter" select="$escapeCharacter" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$text" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
